channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A man is halted climbing the US-Mexico border wall. Under new Trump rules, US troops sound the alarm
3/24/2024: The Right to be Wrong; AMLO; Law of the Sea
item.description: First, a report on the spread of misinformation on social media. Then, Mexican President Andrés Manuel López Obrador: The 60 Minutes Interview. And, U...

item.title: CBS Texas to host benefit concert for flood victims
item.description: As Central Texas recovers from deadly floods, CBS Texas is hosting the "Loud for Love" concert to support victims.

item.title: WATCH: Trump visits Federal Reserve amid criticism of Jerome Powell
item.description: The Trump administration says the president's visit to the Federal Reserve was to check the "progress" of a renovation -- and separate from his frustr...

item.title: WATCH: Trailer home swept away by floodwaters in New Mexico
item.description: A home was swept away by floodwaters in New Mexico on Thursday as storm water rushed off mountainsides that have been scarred by wildfire.

item.title: WATCH: Pedro Pascal on 'Fantastic Four' set dance-offs
item.description: The actor tells "GMA" about how the cast bonded on set.

item.title: Home swept away amid flash flooding in New Mexico mountain village
item.description: Another afternoon of heavy rainfall has prompted flash flooding in the southern New Mexico mountain village of Ruidoso.

item.title: U.S. Department of Justice sues NYC over sanctuary city laws
item.description: It comes less than a week after a Customs and Border Patrol officer was shot by an undocumented immigrant​.

item.title: Powell disagrees with Trump about cost of changes to Fed construction
item.description: President Trump visited the Federal Reserve's headquarters in Washington, keeping up the intense pressure he's been putting on Fed chair Jerome Powell...

item.title: WATCH: Meet the mini horses that give big comfort to hospital patients
item.description: A nonprofit in Southern California is spreading joy with therapy-certified mini horses.

item.title: Police arrest Chuck E. Cheese mascot in front of kids
item.description: A Chuck E. Cheese's mascot has been arrested in Florida after a customer ratted him out as an alleged thief, police said.
